S

saveModel(Model) - Method in class utils.FileSaver
Saves given model into .model file with name matching the name of given model.
setClassificationClasses(List<ClassificationClass>) - Method in class utils.Document
Sets classification classes which this document belongs to to given list.
setClassificationClassesFile(String) - Method in class utils.Model
Sets path to file with list of available classification classes.
setClassifier(String) - Method in class utils.Model
Sets the name of the classifier used to classify documents in this model to given string.
setContent(String) - Method in class utils.Document
Sets content of this document to given string.
setFeatureAlgorithm(String) - Method in class utils.Model
Sets the name of feature algorithm used to compute features in this model to given string.
setFeatures(Map<String, Double>) - Method in class utils.Document
Sets the vector (list) of features (words) representing this document to given vector.
setName(String) - Method in class utils.Model
Sets name of this model to given string.
setTotalUniqueWords(int) - Method in class classifier.NaiveBayesClassifier
Sets number of unique words in training set to a given nimber
setTotalUniqueWords(int) - Method in class utils.Model
Sets number of unique words in training set to given number
setTotalWordsInClass(Map<String, Double>) - Method in class classifier.NaiveBayesClassifier
Sets sums of values of all words in each classification class
setTotalWordsInClass(Map<String, Double>) - Method in class utils.Model
Sets sums of values of all words in each classification class
setTrainingSet(List<Document>) - Method in class utils.Model
Sets the list of documents used for training the classifier to given list.
start(String[]) - Method in class app.DocumentClassifierApp
Executes DocumentClassifier application process.
